cause.description:
We realize that over 90% of America can be considered stupid, therefore our proposition is simple. Nuke 'em. If that doesn't work, because stupid people often amaze us with survival despite overwhelming odds, we will then proceed to send them all to the Sahara desert. How you may ask. Well, we will just tell them that Sahara Desert is in fact made up of finally ground gold dust. But we need your help, our dreams of an Intelligent America can not be realized in our lifetime with the current ratio of Idiots to Intelligent people in America at this moment. It currently stands at a 9 to 1 ratio. That is simply ludacris. Join today, and help provide a brighter future for our children, because wouldnt you want to live in a country without idiots? Join, because we care, and so should you. Thank you.
1. Caution: Slow Children Playing
2. All French people are gay. French-Canadians are even gayer.
3. "I like my gays FLAMING."
4. It's all fun and games until someone loses a nut.
5. Bomb bomb bomb, bomb bomb Saddam.
6. The Fireman is very magical. Rub his helmet and he spits in your eye.
7. What would Brian Boitano do?
8. Club seals for fun. Who likes those furry idiots anyways.
cause.mission: Get rid of stupid people in America.
cause.name: People for the Idiot Removal Act of 1392
